title: Playa Bowls targets North Carolina's Triad region for growth
excerpt: Playa Bowls is looking to grow its footprint in the Tar Heel State.
location: North Carolina's Triad region (Greensboro, Winston-Salem, High Point)

analysis.analysis_explanation: The article discusses Playa Bowls' plans for multiple new store openings in North Carolina, which aligns well with the criteria for commercial building or store opening projects for multiple sites.
analysis.analysis_location: North Carolina's Triad region (Greensboro, Winston-Salem, High Point)
analysis.analysis_contact: Beth Bennett, Playa Bowls franchise owner
analysis.analysis_summary: Playa Bowls plans to open seven new locations in North Carolina's Triad region, expanding its presence in the state. The company is seeking spaces between 1,000 and 2,000 sq. ft. in strategic retail centers.
